name: overstuffed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
filled with too much material or too many things: They sat in overstuffed crimson leather chairs. Phillips sets his story in a dark, overstuffed house in Victorian London.
DISAPPROVING used to describe films, books, etc. that contain too many different things: The filmhad an overstuffed storyline that was filled with plots, counterplots, and betrayals.
